Name: Navigator
Text: We needed to turn off our heating.

Name: Navigator
Text: Those things are after the heat. It's what draws them.

Name: Navigator
Text: You saw the way they pull it? Right out of the engine.

Name: Navigator
Text: Problem is, we won't last one day without it.

Name: Navigator
Text: We'll have to hold on until repairs are finished.

Name: Navigator
Text: I don't know what that thing in the cliffs is or why it's sending freaks our way.

Name: Navigator
Text: I don't want to know either. I don't want to see glimpses of it anymore.

Name: Navigator
Text: I even saw it in a dream...

Name: Navigator
Text: Lock and load. We need to make ourselves scarce.
